languages.text: "Не забывай, кому служишь, Урбенд Драйвстем. Коль Вольный Торговец не желает проводить траурную церемонию..." {n}Голос Абеляра неприятно скрипит.{/n} "...так тому и быть".

traits.locale_text: "Не забывай кому служишь, Урбенд Драйвстем. Коль Вольный Торговец не желает проводить траурную церемонию..." {n}Голос Абеляра неприятно скрипит.{/n} "...так тому и быть".

languages.text: "Do not forget who it is you serve, Urbend Drivestem. If it is the Rogue Trader's wish not to have a mourning ceremony..." {n}Abelard's voice grates unpleasantly.{/n} "...then so be it."
languages.original_text: "Не забывай, кому служишь, Урбенд Драйвстем. Коль Вольный Торговец не желает проводить траурную церемонию..." {n}Голос Абеляра неприятно скрипит.{/n} "...так тому и быть".

traits.locale_text: "Do not forget who it is you serve, Urbend Drivestem. If it is the Rogue Trader's wish not to have a mourning ceremony..." {n}Abelard's voice grates unpleasantly.{/n} "...then so be it."
"Do not forget who it is you serve, Urbend Drivestem. If it is the Rogue Trader's wish not to have a mourning ceremony..." {n}Abelard's voice grates unpleasantly.{/n} "...then so be it."
"Do not forget who it is you serve, Urbend Drivestem. If it is the Rogue Trader's wish not to have a mourning ceremony..." {n}Abelard's voice grates unpleasantly.{/n} "...then so be it."
"Do not forget who it is you serve, Urbend Drivestem. If it is the Rogue Trader's wish not to have a mourning ceremony..." {n}Abelard's voice grates unpleasantly.{/n} "...then so be it."
"Do not forget who it is you serve, Urbend Drivestem. If it is the Rogue Trader's wish not to have a mourning ceremony..." {n}Abelard's voice grates unpleasantly.{/n} "...then so be it."

languages.text: “别忘了你侍奉的人是谁，厄本·德莱夫斯塔。如果行商浪人不打算举行哀悼仪式的话……”{n}阿贝拉德的声音不快地戛然而止。{/n}“……那就不要举行。”
languages.original_text: "Do not forget who it is you serve, Urbend Drivestem. If it is the Rogue Trader's wish not to have a mourning ceremony..." {n}Abelard's voice grates unpleasantly.{/n} "...then so be it."

traits.locale_text: “别忘了你侍奉的人是谁，厄本·德莱夫斯塔。如果行商浪人不打算举行哀悼仪式的话……”{n}阿贝拉德的声音不快地戛然而止。{/n}“……那就不要举行。”

languages.text: «No olvide a quién sirve, Urbend Drivestem. Si {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente quiere que no haya una ceremonia de luto...». {n}La voz de Abelard chirría de forma desagradable.{/n} «... no la habrá».
languages.original_text: "Do not forget who it is you serve, Urbend Drivestem. If it is the Rogue Trader's wish not to have a mourning ceremony..." {n}Abelard's voice grates unpleasantly.{/n} "...then so be it."

traits.locale_text: «No olvide a quién sirve, Urbend Drivestem. Si {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente quiere que no haya una ceremonia de luto...». {n}La voz de Abelard chirría de forma desagradable.{/n} «... no la habrá».

languages.text: 「あなたが誰に仕えているのかお忘れなきよう、アーベント・ドライブステム。服喪の儀式を行わないというのが自由開拓者様のご意思であるのなら…」{n}アベラルドの声から不愉快な感情がにじみ出る。{/n}「…それに従うまで」
languages.original_text: "Do not forget who it is you serve, Urbend Drivestem. If it is the Rogue Trader's wish not to have a mourning ceremony..." {n}Abelard's voice grates unpleasantly.{/n} "...then so be it."

traits.locale_text: 「あなたが誰に仕えているのかお忘れなきよう、アーベント・ドライブステム。服喪の儀式を行わないというのが自由開拓者様のご意思であるのなら…」{n}アベラルドの声から不愉快な感情がにじみ出る。{/n}「…それに従うまで」

languages.text: "Vergesst nicht, wem Ihr dient, Urbend Drivestem. Wenn {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} keine Trauerfeier wünscht ..." {n}Abelards Stimme kratzt unangenehm.{/n} "... dann soll es so sein."
languages.original_text: "Do not forget who it is you serve, Urbend Drivestem. If it is the Rogue Trader's wish not to have a mourning ceremony..." {n}Abelard's voice grates unpleasantly.{/n} "...then so be it."

traits.locale_text: "Vergesst nicht, wem Ihr dient, Urbend Drivestem. Wenn {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} keine Trauerfeier wünscht ..." {n}Abelards Stimme kratzt unangenehm.{/n} "... dann soll es so sein."

languages.text: « N'oubliez pas qui vous servez, Urbend Drivestem, {n}menace Abélard d'une voix grinçante.{/n} Si {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} ne souhaite pas instaurer de période de deuil... alors il en sera ainsi. »
languages.original_text: "Do not forget who it is you serve, Urbend Drivestem. If it is the Rogue Trader's wish not to have a mourning ceremony..." {n}Abelard's voice grates unpleasantly.{/n} "...then so be it."

traits.locale_text: « N'oubliez pas qui vous servez, Urbend Drivestem, {n}menace Abélard d'une voix grinçante.{/n} Si {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} ne souhaite pas instaurer de période de deuil... alors il en sera ainsi. »

languages.text: "Kime hizmet ettiğinizi unutmayın Urbend Drivestem. Hür Tacir bir matem töreni düzenlemek istemiyorsa..." {n}Abelard'ın sesi nahoş bir şekilde gıcırdıyor.{/n} "Bu şekilde ilerlenecektir."
languages.original_text: "Do not forget who it is you serve, Urbend Drivestem. If it is the Rogue Trader's wish not to have a mourning ceremony..." {n}Abelard's voice grates unpleasantly.{/n} "...then so be it."

traits.locale_text: "Kime hizmet ettiğinizi unutmayın Urbend Drivestem. Hür Tacir bir matem seremonisi düzenlemek istemiyorsa..." {n}Abelard'ın sesi nahoş bir şekilde gıcırdıyor.{/n} "...Bu şekilde ilerlenecektir."
